title: Taric's new Passive.
body:
Why is it just a better version of Riven's?  

I would kill for my Passive reducing my cooldowns on her.

The increased attack speed wouldn't be bad either.  




Rito please buff Riven ;-;

replies.body: Because they're not the same champ.

Because Riven already has low cooldowns and animation cancels

Because Taric doesn't have a dash and three mini-hops to close the gap and should be appropriately rewarded for doing so
It's a better version of his own passive, not Rivens. Riven smells, ew.
